channel.title: Builds on Warframe Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Builds on Warframe Blog

item.title: Volt Eidolon Hunter Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at Volt Eidolon Hunter Build that I personally really enjoy using for fighting the Eidolons.

item.title: Nezha Divine Spears Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at Nezha Divine Spears Build and as you might guess it focuses on Divine Spears ability.

item.title: Nezha Safeguard Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at Nezha Safeguard Build which focuses more on Warding Halo ability.

item.title: Amprex Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe weapon build article. Today we gonna take a look at the Amprex.

item.title: Frost Avalanche Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at Frost Avalanche Build. This is my favorite Frost Build and it’s focused around the Icy Avalanche augment mod.

item.title: Excalibur Umbra Exalted Blade Build
item.description: Hello everyone and welcome to another Warframe build article. Today we’re gonna take a quick look at Excalibur Umbra.

item.title: Pyrana Prime Build
item.description: Hello everyone and welcome to another Warframe build article. Today we’re gonna take a quick look at Pyrana Prime our newest secondary shotgun that was just introduced with Limbo Prime.

item.title: Skiajati Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe build article. Today we’re gonna take a quick look at a very special weapon indeed. It is the weapon of the long-awaited Excalibur Umbra and the first weapon to be introduced with Umbra polarities the Skiajati.

item.title: Embolist Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another weapon build article. Today we’re gonna take a quick look at a secondary weapon that I’ve been eyeballing for quite a while because it’s kind of interesting and it goes by the name of Embolist.

item.title: Khora Whip Claw Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another warframe build article. Today I want to go over Khora Whip Claw Build. Well, it’s actually gonna be several builds for Khora, Venari, and melee weapon. I’m also gonna talk a little bit about some of the changes and tweaks that Khora has received and that have at least in my humble opinion made her better.

item.title: Vasto Prime Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. Today we’re gonna take a quick look at the Vasto Prime.

item.title: Braton Vandal Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. Today we’re gonna take a quick look at Braton Vandal a weapon that was only available during a very short time period in open beta for one credit. But now if you want to get your hands on the Braton Vandal you will either have to buy it from other people using platinum or you will have to do the Elite Sanctuary Onslaught.

item.title: Saryn Spore Build
item.description: Hello everyone! Today I’m bringing you guys an updated version of Saryn Spore Build article. As all of you know update 22.20 brought a bunch of new stuff and the biggest change by far is definitely Saryn 3.0. And then Saryn 3.5 rework happens. And because of that, I decided to update this build article too.

item.title: Tysis Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. Today we’re gonna take a quick look at one of the most unique secondary weapons at the Tysis.

item.title: Hystrix Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. And today we’re gonna take a quick look at Khora signature sidearm weapon - the Hystrix that was released with the Beasts of the Sanctuary update.

item.title: Dual Keres Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article and today we’re gonna take a quick look at Khora signature melee weapon the Dual Keres which have been released a few days ago with the Beasts of the Sanctuary update.

item.title: Ivara Concentrated Arrow Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe build article. Update 22.17.3 came out with four Augment Mods. The most interesting one is definitely the mod for Ivara - Concentrated Arrow.

item.title: Nova Speed Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at the Nova Speed Build which unlike Nova Slow Build speeds enemies up rather than slowing them down.

item.title: Nova Slow Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at the Nova Slow Build.

item.title: Valkyr Warcry Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at the Valkyr Warcry Build.

item.title: Wukong Immortal Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at Wukong Immortal Build. This build is fantastic for a very tricky mission, tough sorties, and generally, missions that would straight-up destroy other warframes.

item.title: Oberon Eidolon Hunter Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at the Oberon Eidolon Hunter Build.

item.title: Hydroid Pilfering Swarm Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re going to take a look at the Hydroid Pilfering Swarm Build.

item.title: Limbo Rift Torrent Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at the Limbo Rift Torrent Build.

item.title: Kronen Prime Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. And today we’re gonna take a quick look at the newest addition to our melee arsenal and the first Prime tonfa in the game - the Kronen Prime.

item.title: Tiberon Prime Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. And today we’re gonna take a quick look at the newest addition to our primary rifle arsenal the Tiberon Prime.

item.title: Hydroid Puddle Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re going to take a look at the Hydroid Puddle Build.

item.title: Zephyr Jet Stream Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. And today we’re gonna take a look at Zephyr who has had a bit of a rework with update 22.12.0.

item.title: Volt Discharge Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re going to take a look at the Volt Discharge Build.

item.title: Equinox Mend and Maim Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at Equinox Mend and Maim Build.

item.title: Banshee Resonating Quake Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe build article. As you probably know, Resonating Quake mod got changed last month and because of that today we’re going to take a look at some Banshee Resonating Quake Builds and find out if the mod is still worth it or not.

item.title: Equinox Focus Farm Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at Equinox Focus Farm Build. Equinox is probably the best focus farming warframe in the entire game at the moment. But don’t be fooled by that he’s not just a focus farmer he can do a lot of other stuff as well. But about that, we will talk in another article.

item.title: Banshee Savage Silence Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re going to take a look at Banshee and Banshee Prime specifically the Banshee Savage Silence Build which is my favorite focus farming setup because it’s actually fun to use. It’s nice and fast..

item.title: Volt Speed Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna check out Volt Speed Build.

item.title: Excalibur Exalted Blade Build
item.description: Hey guys. And today we’re going to continue Excalibur Builds series and take a look at Excalibur Exalted Blade Build which is focused around Exalted Blade and I’m gonna show you both the normal version and the Chromatic Blade one. The reason I separated them is that you want to use a different build on your melee weapon for each one.

item.title: Ignis Wraith Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another weapon build article. Today we will take a look at the Ignis Wraith. The Ignis Wraith got buffed recently and most importantly the beam weapon type itself. So, let me show you how strong the Ignis has become.

item.title: Stubba Build
item.description: Hey guys and today I want to take a quick look at Grineer pistol the Stubba.

item.title: Excalibur Radial Javelin Build
item.description: Hey guys. And today we’re going to continue Excalibur Builds series and take a look at Excalibur Radial Javelin Build.

item.title: Banshee Resonance Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re going to take a look at Banshee and Banshee Prime specifically the Banshee Resonance Build which is a fantastic build that you can use in all kinds of different missions. It’s kind of like the most versatile one and it’s my most used Banshee build by far.

item.title: Atlas One Punch Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna take a look at Atlas who has received a fantastic new mechanic in the form of a rubble where petrified enemies will drop rubble upon death and you can run over the rubble to pick it up which one either heal you or if you’re at full health it will temporarily boost your armor.

item.title: Trinity Blessing Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna check out Trinity Blessing Build which focuses on Blessing and it’s geared more towards providing massive damage reduction as well as healing to your entire team.

item.title: Trinity Energy Vampire Build
item.description: Hey guys and today we’re gonna check out Trinity EV Build which focuses on Energy Vampire ability and the Vampire Leech augment mod and it provides a lot of energy and over shields to your entire team and can also do some really nice burst healing with the Blessing.

item.title: Nekros Desecrate Build
item.description: Hey guys. Today we’re gonna take a look at the Nekros. And I’ve been using the exact same build for well over a year now and I haven’t been able to come up with anything better than this. It’s the Nekros Desecrate Build that basically feeds itself through Equilibrium mod.

item.title: Rhino Stomp Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another warfare build. Today we’re going to take a look at Rhino Stomp Build.

item.title: Excalibur Radial Blind Build
item.description: Hey guys. And today we’re going to start a new Excalibur Builds series. And let’s start it off with Excalibur Radial Blind Build!

item.title: Loki Invisibility/Disarm Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another warframe build article. And today we're gonna check out Loki Invisibility Build.

item.title: Rhino Roar Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another warfare build. Today we’re going to take a look at Rhino Roar Build and I love this build for hunting the Teralyst in the Plains of Eidolon . So, let’s get into it.

item.title: Warframe Cassowar Build
item.description: Hello everyone! Today we’re going to be taking a look at the newly released Tenno polearm called the Cassowar. This is the right from the name of the bird cassowary and the tip of this gorgeous melee looks like the head of that bird further confirming the fact that that is the inspiration for this weapon.

item.title: Rhino Iron Skin Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another warfare build. Today we’re going to take a look at Rhino Iron Skin Build.

item.title: Ember World On Fire Build
item.description: Hey guys! Today we’re going to take a look at two World on Fire builds that I like to use on Ember and switch between them based on what I’m doing.

item.title: Frost Snow Globe Build
item.description: Hello everyone. Today we’re going to continue the Frost Builds series and check out Frost Snow Globe Build!

item.title: Frost Ice Wave Build
item.description: Hey guys. And today we’re going to start a new Frost Builds series.

item.title: Mesa Peacemaker Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another warframe build. Today we’re going to check out Mesa Peacemaker Build.

item.title: Quartakk build
item.description: Hello everyone! Today we’re going to be taking a look at the newly introduced Grineer rifle and this is going to be the Quartakk.

item.title: Rakta Dark Dagger Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. And today I want to check out the Rakta Dark Dagger which is a radiation-based dagger that you can get if you’re the rank of exalted with the Red Veil syndicate and it costs a whopping 125,000 standing.

item.title: Argonak Build. Critical rifle with a laser-sight.
item.description: Hello everyone. Today I’m bringing you a quick review of the Grineer assault rifle called the Argonak.

item.title: Gunsen Build - New & Strong Melee Type
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another weapon build article. Update 22.8 introduced a new melee type called Warfan. Because of that let’s take a look at the very first Warframe weapon - Gunsen.

item.title: Lenz build. The AoE Bow.
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another weapon build article. Today we will take a look at the AoE bow - Lenz.

item.title: Corinth build & review. Tenno Shotgun.
item.description: Hello everyone! Today I’m bringing you guys a build for the Corinth. And this is a tenno shotgun a lot of us have been waiting for.

item.title: Akbolto Prime Build
item.description: Hey guys. Welcome to another Warframe article and today I want to take a quick look at our newest secondary weapon the amazing the beautiful Akbolto Prime.

item.title: Sybaris Prime Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another weapon build article. Today we will take a look at the Sybaris Prime. Worth the effort or not, let’s find out!

item.title: Kogake Prime Build
item.description: Hey guys! Welcome to another Warframe article and today I want to take a quick look at our newest breakdance enabling device the Kogake Prime.

item.title: Mirage Prime Build
item.description: Hello everyone! Today we’re going to be taking a look at Mirage Prime: some of the changes that come with her, some of the stats increase, the looks, the design. In towards the end of this article, I will be showing you guys my amazing all-around build and how I’ve been running Mirage Prime since the update launched.

item.title: Warframe Baza Build
item.description: Hey guys! Welcome to another Warframe build article and today we’re gonna take a quick look at our newest primary weapon the Baza.

item.title: Cernos Prime Build
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another weapon build article. Today we will take a look at Cernos Prime and if this weapon is really worth the effort or not.
